__e: I use my father's name as he was my source of inspiration I followed in his footsteps
- Honey, when you write a college essay, you need to write about who you really are, not who you pretend to be, OK?
So you ask, what is the motivation for a man to do what he did?
Quite the incentive to do whatever it takes to "almost always" win.
There's less motivation anyway because of the blowout and you have no idea how fast these things can become a race.
In other words, change the motivation from "I want to play this game"... to "I have to play this game. "
